languages.text: {n}Дознаватель сканирует окружающий вас распад и тлен холодным взглядом.{/n} "Трон нас храни от происков Архиврага..."
{n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель сканирует окружающий вас распад и тлен холодным взглядом.{/n} "Трон нас храни от происков Архиврага..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

{n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."
{n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

languages.text: {n}El Interrogador recorre la decadencia y la descomposición que os rodea con una mirada helada.{/n} «Que el Trono nos proteja del Archienemigo y sus maquinaciones...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Interrogador recorre la decadencia y la descomposición que os rodea con una mirada helada.{/n} «Que el Trono nos proteja del Archienemigo y sus maquinaciones...».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは氷のような眼差しで、周囲の溶解と腐敗を見渡す。{/n}「玉座よ、我々を渾沌の勢力の策略からお守りください…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは氷のような眼差しで、周囲の溶解と腐敗を見渡す。{/n}「玉座よ、我々を渾沌の勢力の策略からお守りください…」

languages.text: {n}海因里希以冰冷的目光扫过你周围的一片狼藉。{/n}“愿黄金王座保佑我们免受混沌大敌的侵害……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以冰冷的目光扫过你周围的一片狼藉。{/n}“愿黄金王座保佑我们免受混沌大敌的侵害……”

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur balaie d'un regard glacial la corruption et la décomposition qui vous entourent.{/n} « Puisse le Trône nous préserver des machinations du Grand Ennemi... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur balaie d'un regard glacial la corruption et la décomposition qui vous entourent.{/n} « Puisse le Trône nous préserver des machinations du Grand Ennemi... »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator betrachtet mit eisigem Blick die Auflösung und den Verfall um euch herum.{/n} "Der Thron bewahre uns vor den Intrigen des Erzfeinds ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the dissolution and decay around you with an icy stare.{/n} "Throne preserve us from the Archenemy's machinations..."
